ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Integrated (ALPHA): A Whole New Game
ModMetaData.author: CTH2004
ModMetaData.description:
A simple core for all mods by The Dynamic Trio (well, currently just me...)
FAQ Q: CE Compatible? A: Uh... sure. Might have "unintented features" that won't be removed on my end, but, you do you and all!
